text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet tnm-distant-metastases-category-vs

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222587001 (American Joint Committee on Cancer clinical M category allowable value (qualifier value))
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222591006 (American Joint Committee on Cancer pathological M category allowable value (qualifier value))

name: TNMDistantMetastasesCategoryVS
title: TNM Distant Metastases Category Value Set
publisher: IDG Institut für digitale Gesundheitsdaten RLP gGmbH

contact.name: IDG Institut für digitale Gesundheitsdaten RLP gGmbH

description: Result values for M category. This value set contains SNOMED-CT equivalents of UICC codes for the M category, according to TNM staging rules.
copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement
